name: The Letter (itch)
description:
The Letter is a short "Horror" Adventure game made with RPG Maker MV.

Story:

Eimi suddenly woke up in a strange place, no one knows what that place is it could be a dorm building, a small house, a part of a mansion, or something...

Our heroine doesn't have any memories when and why was she in that strange place, all that she knows is that she needs to escape...

Important Notes:

  • Since this game is just a small project for me to experiment on, the story is kinda eh.
  • Depending on how well the game goes I might not release a continuation of this game. (But I will indeed try to release some games here and there).
  • From the start of the description, I said that the game is a "Horror" Adventure game. I emphasized "Horror" because the game doesn't have many jumpscares but it might have some sound effects that might startle the player a bit.
  • This game is kind of experimental, I just created this game to test out the software and such.
  • Sorry for any grammar and spelling errors XD

#horror #adventure #rpg
